title: [seal] Build error on x64-linux : Not able to build seal with hexl using vcpkg

labels.name: category:port-bug
labels.description: The issue is with a library, which is something the port should already support

body:
Package: seal[core,hexl,ms-gsl,no-throw-tran,zlib,zstd]:x64-linux@4.1.1#1

**Host Environment**

- Host: x64-linux
- Compiler: GNU 11.4.0
-    vcpkg-tool version: 2024-03-14-7d353e869753e5609a1f1a057df3db8fd356e49d
    vcpkg-scripts version: 9224b3bbd 2024-04-20 (2 days ago)

**To Reproduce**

`vcpkg install seal[no-throw-tran,hexl]`
**Failure logs**

```
-- Using cached microsoft-SEAL-v4.1.1.tar.gz.
-- Cleaning sources at vcpkg/buildtrees/seal/src/v4.1.1-a07550d14c.clean. Use --editable to skip cleaning for the packages you specify.
-- Extracting source vcpkg/downloads/microsoft-SEAL-v4.1.1.tar.gz
-- Applying patch shared-zstd.patch
-- Using source at vcpkg/buildtrees/seal/src/v4.1.1-a07550d14c.clean
-- Configuring x64-linux
CMake Error at scripts/cmake/vcpkg_execute_required_process.cmake:112 (message):
    Command failed: vcpkg/downloads/tools/ninja/1.10.2-linux/ninja -v
    Working Directory:vcpkg/buildtrees/seal/x64-linux-rel/vcpkg-parallel-configure
    Error code: 1
    See logs for more information:
      /vcpkg/buildtrees/seal/config-x64-linux-dbg-CMakeCache.txt.log
      vcpkg/buildtrees/seal/config-x64-linux-rel-CMakeCache.txt.log
      vcpkg/buildtrees/seal/config-x64-linux-out.log

Call Stack (most recent call first):
  installed/x64-linux/share/vcpkg-cmake/vcpkg_cmake_configure.cmake:252 (vcpkg_execute_required_process)
  ports/seal/portfile.cmake:31 (vcpkg_cmake_configure)
  scripts/ports.cmake:175 (include)


...........................................................................................................................................................................................

CMake Warning at vcpkg/scripts/buildsystems/vcpkg.cmake:859 (_find_package):
  Could not find a configuration file for package "HEXL" that is compatible
  with requested version "1.2.4".

  The following configuration files were considered but not accepted:

    vcpkg/installed/x64-linux/share/HEXL/HEXLConfig.cmake, version: 1.2.5
    /usr/local/lib/cmake/hexl-1.2.5/HEXLConfig.cmake, version: 1.2.5

Call Stack (most recent call first):
  CMakeLists.txt:226 (find_package)


CMake Error at CMakeLists.txt:228 (message):
  Intel HEXL: not found
